parameters.name: App
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the subtitle rule. The description can be up to 128 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, and special characters.

parameters.name: IsLazy
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to generate live subtitles when stream pulling starts. Valid values:

*   true: generates live subtitles when stream pulling starts and stops generating live subtitles when no streams are pulled for 5 minutes. When stream pulling restarts, live subtitles are generated again.
*   false: generates live subtitles when stream ingest starts.

parameters.name: RulesId
parameters.description: The ID of the subtitle rule.

parameters.name: StudioName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual background template.

parameters.name: SubtitleId
parameters.description: The ID of the subtitle template.

parameters.name: SubtitleName
parameters.description: The name of the subtitle template.
